name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, netizens from all over the country launched the "I Speak for Cow Cats" campaign, calling on the government to advance the legislation of the Animal Protection Law as soon as possible.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
@0ujXByOpKClR3ZM My view is that anyone who stands up for something they care about is brave. I don't agree with the view that because animals are not as important as humans, legislation to protect animals is not important before solving human problems.
Urging progress in animal protection legislation is also progress. We can't expect a big split to solve all problems. The road is long, and running, walking, and jumping are all ways to move forward.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
@CDTChinese Now I think about it
The content of this month's battle includes but is not limited to
impersonating hundreds of my small accounts
collectively reporting me in large numbers
sending private messages and adding WeChat to hundreds of thousands of Twitter friends impersonating me
flooding my comment area with comments
using various small accounts to expose my personal information and that of my girlfriend from five to ten years ago
It was a truly unforgettable battle.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
"Punch deduction"
On May 24, a public account broke the news that a winery in Guizhou applied for the "Ping Jing Xi Jing Ping" trademark in 2021, which was designated for use on beer and liquor products respectively. As a result, it was fined 10,000 yuan in April this year, and its trademark agency was fined 100,000 yuan.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen submissions
Under a news report that the State Council Information Office held a press conference saying that "my country's grain reserves are nearly 700 million tons", the comments section was flooded with comments
Netizens pointed out that during the epidemic, ibuprofen was hard to find and the price of hero vegetables was sky-high, so they did not believe that the relief food would really help them.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 25, at the World Trade Plaza in Lixia District, Jinan, Shandong, the owners collectively defended their rights due to the unfinished project.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Another incident of insulting the military! A B-station up master "Kuang Mo Ge" was permanently banned by the platform for criticizing the Chinese rapper Pharaoh's "Little River Flowing Water 1952" as unpleasant.
It is reported that the reason is that "Little River Flowing Water 1952" is a song based on the War to Resist U.S. Aggression and Aid Korea, and was once posted on the homepage of B-station by the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Additional reading: Gong Linna & Pharaoh "Little River Flowing 1952"

Netizen contribution
Recently, a video of a classroom surveillance video of a domestic school has been widely circulated on Douyin. In the video, the slightest movement will be recognized.
One netizen lamented, "I thought it was a school, but it turned out to be a prison."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Later, the public account article was deleted

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On May 24, two incidents of injury were summarized.
On the evening of the 24th, a boy from a middle school in Guang'an, Sichuan was beaten to death by two classmates because of a quarrel.
In the early morning of the 24th, in Sanya, Hainan, a man hacked and killed two people one after another.
